wilma: Wilma has swirly red-orange hair, wears a loincloth dress with a torn hemline and a pearl necklace.
fred: Fred is chubby, has black hair, a large nose and wears an orange and black spotted short-sleeved loincloth with a blue scarf.
betty: Betty is a slender lady with black shoulder-length hair and black eyes, wearing a loincloth dress.
barney: Barney is short, has yellow hair, oval eyes and wears a brown loincloth with a black X-shaped shoelace on the top.
dino: Dino is a purple Snorkasaurus with black spots, three black hairs and a blue choker.
pebbles: Pebbles is a little girl with red-orange hair, black eyes and a white bone in her ponytail.
mr slate: Mr. Slate is tall, has tan stubble, black eyes, is nearly bald and wears a black tie and black glasses.
baby puss: Baby Puss is a large saber-toothed cat with yellow-orange fur, black spots and a long tail.
hoppy: Hoppy is a green Hopparoo with black spots, a yellow-tan muzzle and back spikes.
